title: Unusual Lag and Extremely Long loading time that was never there before
body: Usually after logging it would instantly load up the client and just get me to the main menu, and I was also having a constant ping of 200 which is fine by me. Because I'm used to it and I've always been good playing like that. However, now for some reason there's been this constant unusual lag that goes to like 370~400 for some reason. So my friends helped me out and found out that now my isp is bouncing to Japan first then goes to the Official NA server which is why I'm lagging. Is there anyway to fix this in any sort of ways?

replies.body:
Whelp that ISP route is definitely not optimal that's for sure. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

If you already ran a trace route using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) or similar program to see where your ISP is sending your connection, then go ahead and send that to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). This way they can look over all the info and see if there is anything we could do on our end to help your connection.
I have also been experiencing similar issues. Mine has also been crashing with a bug splat.
